title: List of German dishes
data: The name given to a salted ( cured ) and slightly smoked cut of pork similar to British gammon . It can be either hotly or coldly smoked
A pickled cabbage dish similar to sauerkraut . It contains not only white cabbage but also collard greens ( or leaves of red cabbage ) and kale , as well as grape leaf and cherry leaf
A simple , fresh , strongly smoked sausage ( Rohwurst ) made of lights , pork and fat , which is mostly eaten cooked with kale ( cabbage ) dishes
A hearty and smoked ham from Westfalen that is very aromatic
A kind of blood sausage that contains rye bread , pig-blood , milk , eggs , fat , salt , and pepper
Roast beef served with various sides such as potato wedges and vegetables
A hearty bread ; it goes black because the sugar in the bread goes to caramel
A gentleman 's creme that consists of vanilla jelly with cream and rum

Barley groats cooked in sausage juices ( Wurstbrühe ) , which are enriched with pieces of meat , offal , such as heart , kidney or liver and seasoned with spices and salt . The cooked ingredients are minced after the juices have been poured off and a crumbly cake is left which is held together with fat and which sets on cooling
intro: Below is a list of dishes found in German cuisine.
